Windlord:

Windlord opened his comm link to Hot rod "Hot rod, situation in 
Chivtron's base is worse than I belive... I don't know if you can 
recive my message, we need help... I know that our faction aren't 
allies yet... But if maximals don't help us, we're lost... Could 
maximals help us?" he was waitting Hot Rod's answer until he looked 
Trinity in battlefield, he open his comm link in Chivtron's 
Frecuency"I'm lookin Trinity in Blattlefield, I'm going to rescue her 
before she gets hurt cover me!!!"

Winlord flew where Trinity was
